FlashSpidey
The double outwit makes her very good. Plus the fantastic four keyword, which is going to allow for a lot of fun shenanigans. Plus add in Thing Robot. This piece is going to be fun. Many fun possibilities Overall, I really like how this set used this piece and Colossus to add new elements to the sidekicks feature. Going to be fun to mess around with. Edit: thought someone was a sidekick who wasn't. Thanks for pointing that out Goop. My bad.

November 30, 2021
Goop
So Onome herself is a Captain/Sidekick so you immediately get 2 outwits for 40pts. That is amazing value. When you start utilizing other equips like time or reality gem with her or on other sidekicks she will be absolutely devastating. You do need to protect her defense though but that shouldn't be too hard with FF (Defends) or Wakanda (Def boosting). Best common in the set.
